summary: This mod alloww you to craft most of the staves that are at the moment ingame.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=70]Craftable Staves
[/size][/center]
[i][center]by Octavvius[/center][/i]
[center]V.1.3[/center]  
[center]30 Staves made Craftable at the moment[/center]

[u]Describtion[/u]
First i will say that this is my first mod so it is not so big. At the moment there are 30 staffs(of i think 40) include to be craftable but there will follow more.
The images are in german because i just have the german version of Skyrim ;D

[u]Main file:[/u] Staves
The Staves and how you craft them are:
Staff of Icy:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Grand Soulgem,1 Scroll of Icy,1 Frostsalt
Staff of Incinerate:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Incinerate,1 Firesalt
Staff of Thunderbolt:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Common Soulgem,1 Scroll of Thunderbolt
Staff of Wall of Flame:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Wall of Flame
Staff of ConjureFireAtronach:4 Firewood,2 Ebonyingot,1 Common Soulgem,1 Scroll of conjure Fireatronach,2 Firesalt
Staff of Ice Storm:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Ice Storm
Staff of Paralyze:8 Firewood,3 Corundumingot,1 Black Soulgem,1 Scroll of Paralyze
Staff of Firebolt:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Firebolt
Staff of Sparks:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Sparks
Staff of Fear:6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Grand Soulgem,1 Scroll of Fear,1 Amethyst

Staff of Heal other     :8 Firewood,2 Moonstoneingot,1 Common Soulgem,1 Scroll of heal other
Staff of Healing Hands  :8 Firewood,2 Moonstoneingot,1 Petty Soulgem,1 Scroll of heal other
Staff of Rout           :6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Grand Soulgem,1 Scroll of Rout
Staff of Frenzy         :6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Frenzy
Staff of Calm           :6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Calm
Staff of Wall of Storms :5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulstone,1 Scroll of Icebolt,1 Scroll of Fireball
Staff of Wall of Frost  :5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Icebold
Staff of Chain lightning:5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Chain lightning
Staff of Turn Undead    :8 Firewood,2 Moonstoneingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of Turn Undead
Staff of Fireball       :5 Firewood,2 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulstone,1 Scroll of Fireball

Staff of Mass Charm            :6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of MassParalyze
Staff of Rally                 :6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Lesser Soulgem,1 Scroll of Rally
Staff of Fury                  :6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Common Soulgem,1 Scroll of Fury
Staff of Courage               :6 Firewood,3 Goldingot,1 Petty Soulgem,1 Scroll of Courage
Staff of Conjure Familiar      :4 Firewood,2 Ebonyingot,1 Common Soulgem,1 Scroll of ConjureFamiliar
Staff of Conjure Storm Atronach:4 Firewood,2 Ebonyingot,1 Greater Soulgem,1 Scroll of ConjureStormAtronach,2 Void Salt
Staff of Revenant              :4 Firewood,2 Ebonyingot,1 Common Soulgem,1 Scroll of Revenant
Staff of Command Deadra        :4 Firewood,2 Ebonyingot,1 Grand Soulgem,1 Scroll of CommandDaedra
Staff of Raise Zombie          :4 Firewood,2 Ebonyingot,1 Lesser Soulgem,1 Scroll of RaiseZombie
Staff of Reanimate Corpse      :4 Firewood,2 Ebonyingot,1 Common Soulgem,1 Scroll of ReanimateCorpse

They all can be found in the Smith menu in the section Misc

[u]Install[/u]
Before you install the mod just be sure to make a backup.
1. Download the file and copy the .esp file in Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data
2. Start the Skyrim launcher and just go to the data file option in the middle then thick the box next to Craftable Staffs.esp on ( if it isnt automaticly)
3. Start the game and have fun ;D

[u]Update[/u]
To update my mod just copy the new file in the \"data\" folder of skyrim so that the new one overwrite the old one.

[u]Uninstall[/u]
Just delete the .esp file from the \"data\" folder

Also see my other mod (wich now has it own file): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1217]Craftable Soulgems[/url]

[u]To do list[/u]
+ adding more staffs
+ adding scrolls to be craftable
+ adding new staves which are not ingame.
+ try to add staves wich are not entchanted

Ideas for what i can also add?
If you have you an idea wich items or staffs i can also add to craftable you can write me a pm.

[u]Changelog[/u]
03.12.2011 - V.1.3 - Adding 20 new awsome Staves! Enjoy :D
22.11.2011 - V.1.0 - Adding an entire Upgrading/Downgrading mod for soulstones(now has it own file see above to do)
22.11.2011 - V. 1.2 - Adding 5 new Staffs
21.11.2011 - V. 1.1 - Adding 2 New Staffs
21.11.2011 - V. 1.0 - Start the file with adding 3 staffs

[u]Some Mods you really should look:[/u]

(And i want also mention that i work for some extra feature for supporters, for example pre access
